name: Ōkinoko ShinDAO [beta]
description: Create your own DAO with your own rules!

functions.name: project_create
functions.description: Bootstraps a DAO, using the caller's transfer.allow intent to split funds between initial stake and treasury.

wizardSteps.title: Basics
wizardSteps.description: Name your DAO and add a description

wizardSteps.title: NFT Gate
wizardSteps.disabledMessage: NFT gated membership will get activated in near future

parameters.name: Description
parameters.hintText: Add a description but always remember the more characters you use, the higher the gas cost.

parameters.name: Project URL
parameters.hintText: Optional URL for this DAO

parameters.name: Voting System
parameters.hintText: Choose between democratic (1 vote per member) or stake-weighted voting.

parameters.name: Threshold Percent
parameters.hintText: This is the percentage where a proposal is considered passed. Defaults to 50.01%

parameters.name: Quorum Percent
parameters.hintText: This is the minimum percentage of total stake/members that need to vote for a proposal to be valid. Defaults to 50.01%

parameters.name: Proposal Duration (hours)
parameters.hintText: This is the duration for which a proposal is open for voting. Defaults to 24 hours.

parameters.name: Execution Delay (hours)
parameters.hintText: This is the delay before a proposal is executed after it is approved.

parameters.name: Leave Cooldown (hours)
parameters.hintText: This is the cooldown period after leaving the DAO before rejoining.

parameters.name: Proposal Cost
parameters.hintText: This is the cost associated with submitting a proposal. This cost is added to the project the treasury.

parameters.name: Minimum Stake Amount
parameters.hintText: This is the minimum amount of stake required to participate in the DAO. For democratic DAOs, this is the exact member fee.

parameters.name: Membership NFT Contract
parameters.hintText: In future you will be able to set a membership NFT contract to gate access to the DAO.

parameters.name: Membership NFT Function
parameters.hintText: This is the function that will be called on the membership NFT contract.

parameters.name: Membership NFT Token ID
parameters.hintText: This is the ID of the membership NFT. The NFT needs to be an editioned NFT.

parameters.name: Membership Payload Format ({nft}|{caller})
parameters.hintText: This is the format for the membership NFT payload.

parameters.name: Proposal Creator Restriction
parameters.hintText: Restrict proposal creation to members only or allow the public.

parameters.name: Project Metadata
parameters.hintText: This is the metadata associated with the project. It will not get used/checked by the contract but can be useful for frontends.

parameters.name: Initial deposit (stake + treasury)
parameters.hintText: This is the initial deposit for the project. Excess funds beyond the minimum stake amount will go to the treasury.

functions.name: project_join
functions.description: Validates membership requirements (NFT gate if configured) and stakes via transfer.allow.

parameters.name: Project Id
parameters.hintText: This is the ID of the project you want to join.

parameters.name: transfer.allow intent (membership stake)
parameters.hintText: This is the membership fee. For democratic DAOs this needs to equal the minimum stake amount.

functions.name: project_leave
functions.description: Requests exit (or finalizes it after cooldown) and withdraws stake when safe.

parameters.name: Project Id
parameters.hintText: This is the ID of the project you want to leave.

functions.name: project_funds
functions.description: Adds funds to personal stake or the treasury using transfer.allow; democratic DAOs can only top up the treasury.

parameters.name: Project Id
parameters.hintText: This is the ID of the project you want to add funds to.

parameters.name: Add To Stake? (true/false)
parameters.hintText: Indicates whether the funds should be added to the personal stake or the treasury.

parameters.name: Deposit amount / asset
parameters.hintText: This is the amount and asset you want to deposit. The asset must match the project's asset.

functions.name: project_transfer
functions.description: Owner-only transfer of project ownership to another member.

parameters.name: Project Id
parameters.hintText: This is the ID of the project you want to transfer ownership of.

parameters.name: New Owner Address
parameters.hintText: This is the address of the new owner.

functions.name: project_pause
functions.description: Owner toggles pause state immediately; paused projects only accept unpause proposals.

parameters.name: Project Id
parameters.hintText: This is the ID of the project you want to pause or unpause.

parameters.name: Pause Flag (true/false, default true)
parameters.hintText: Indicates whether the project should be paused or unpaused.

functions.name: proposal_create
functions.description: Creates governance or payout proposals; options default to no/yes unless provided. Costs are charged via transfer.allow when configured.

wizardSteps.title: Proposal
wizardSteps.description: Title and description for your proposal

wizardSteps.title: Answers
wizardSteps.description: Define the voting choices for your poll

parameters.name: Project Id
parameters.hintText: This is the ID of the project you want to create a proposal for.

parameters.name: Proposal Description
parameters.hintText: This is the description of the proposal. Remember that longer descriptions increase gas costs.

parameters.name: Custom Duration (hours)
parameters.hintText: This is the custom duration for the proposal in hours. If not set, the project's default duration will be used.

parameters.name: Options (semicolon separated)
parameters.hintText: These are the options for the proposal, separated by semicolons. If not provided, defaults to No;Yes.

parameters.name: Poll Mode
parameters.hintText: Indicates whether the proposal should be a simple poll. In poll mode, proposals cannot execute actions / transfers.

parameters.name: Payout Instructions (addr:amount;...)
parameters.hintText: These are the payout instructions for the proposal, specifying the address and amount for each payout. Separate multiple instructions with semicolons.

parameters.name: Meta Actions (key=value;...)
parameters.hintText: These are the meta actions for the proposal, specified as key-value pairs. Separate multiple actions with semicolons.

metaOptions.hint: Toggle project pause state (true pauses, false unpauses)
Cooldown before members can leave, in hours
Restrict proposal creation to only members
contract we should lookup for the membershi NFTs
function we should call on the membership NFT contract
payload we should send to the membership NFT contract (must contain `{nft}` and `{caller}`)

parameters.name: Inter-Contract Call (ICC)
parameters.hintText: Call another contract when the proposal passes. Specify the contract, action, and parameters.

parameters.name: Proposal Metadata
parameters.hintText: These are the metadata for the proposal. Will not be used/checked by the contract but can be useful for frontends.

parameters.name: Proposal URL
parameters.hintText: Optional URL for this proposal

parameters.name: Proposal cost
parameters.hintText: This cost is defined by the DAO settings and will be charged when creating the proposal.

functions.name: proposals_vote
functions.description: Members cast or update votes by passing option indexes (comma/semicolon separated). Weight equals current stake.

parameters.name: Proposal Id
parameters.hintText: This is the ID of the proposal you want to vote on.

parameters.name: Choices (comma/semicolon indexes)
parameters.hintText: These are the choices you want to vote for, specified as comma or semicolon separated indexes.

functions.name: proposal_tally
functions.description: Tallies votes after the deadline, sets proposal state, and schedules execution if passed.

parameters.name: Proposal Id
parameters.hintText: This is the ID of the proposal you want to tally.

functions.name: proposal_execute
functions.description: Executes passed proposals after execution delay, moving funds and applying meta updates.

parameters.name: Proposal Id
parameters.hintText: This is the ID of the proposal you want to execute.

functions.name: proposal_cancel
functions.description: Creator or owner cancels an active proposal; owner-triggered cancels refund the proposal cost when funds exist.

parameters.name: Proposal Id
parameters.hintText: This is the ID of the proposal you want to cancel.
